section.name: About the Plugin
section.p: This Maven plugin centralizes configuration of core documentation, to ensure that output documents are formatted uniformly.
With centralized configuration handled by this Maven plugin, the core documentation-related project configuration takes at least two arguments:

ul.li: <projectName>, the short name for the project such as OpenAM, OpenDJ, or OpenIDM
<googleAnalyticsId>, to add Google Analytics JavaScript to the HTML output

section.p: The project then runs two plugin executions:

ol.li: A build goal in the pre-site phase to build and massage output
A layout goal in the site phase to copy content under site-doc

section.p: For more information, see the README.
